descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces Requiem's dwemer construct defenses with high AR and arrow protection that follows Requiem's normal armor penetration rules, so a "daedric can-opener" is no longer required to tackle dwemer ruins.  This was made for Requiem 1.9.4 and inspired by the proposed upcoming changes to dwemer constructs for Requiem 2.0.  Since Requiem 2.0 may not be out for a while and will require a new game, this will allow players to enjoy the changes to dwemer constructs now and complete their 1.9.4 characters without needing daedric weapons to tackle dwemer ruins. 

I made this for personal use but I have had some requests to release it.  Specific changes are: two perks from dwemer constructs were removed and replaced with a perk and an actor effect, so spheres/centurions now get a flat 900 AR and 70% resistance to arrows in lieu of the prior resistances that could only be pierced by Daedric. Spiders now have 600 AR and 50% arrow resistance  Enjoy, and let me know if you run into any issue.

Added under Optional Files is a mod that increases loot in bandit chests by adding a good chance to find silver dishware and fine cloths, and other random items, and also increases the gold and gems you will find in bandit boss chests.
